Title: Relates to air quality in schools and student health
Summary: Authorizes the department of health to establish an indoor air quality inspection, measurement and evaluation program; defines terms; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 4-A §§2576 - 2576-e, amd §3-0301, En Con L; amd §§305 & 3602, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the environmental conservation law and the education law, in relation to air quality in schools and student health
